ygData.msgSnippet: Well on  the message boards at the KnightWatch there has been lots of talk lately about the list http://www.soerbaird.com/shadowknight/ Check under the quests
ygData.messageBody:
Well on the message boards at the KnightWatch there has been lots of talk
lately about the list

http://www.soerbaird.com/shadowknight/

Check under the quests forum....

--Grumbul



> Thought I'd share that I *finally* finished the Bayle List quest tonight.
> Well ... I don't think finished. I'm sure there is more to it, but I
> retrieve it, decoded it, and returned it to Pietro. Wondering how others
> were doing with this as this list has been quiet. I'm so happy to have
> finally finished this part of it ... my notes are scribbled all over the
> place on stuff and what people said and all that rigamaroll.
>
> So ... has anyone else been working on it? Made any other headway? etc.
>
> later,
> jer
>
> aka
>
> Virten, Knight of Innoruuk
